verses.esv: 28 And do not fear those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul. Rather fear him who can destroy both soul and body in hell.
verses.kjv: 28 And fear not them which kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul: but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.
verses.niv: 28 Do not be afraid of those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul. Rather, be afraid of the One who can destroy both soul and body in hell.

verses.esv: 13 “Enter by the narrow gate. For the gate is wide and the way is easy that leads to destruction, and those who enter by it are many. 14 For the gate is narrow and the way is hard that leads to life, and those who find it are few.
verses.kjv: 13 Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat: 14 Because strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.
verses.niv: 13 "Enter through the narrow gate. For wide is the gate and broad is the road that leads to destruction, and many enter through it. 14 But small is the gate and narrow the road that leads to life, and only a few find it.

verses.esv: 19 Their end is destruction, their god is their belly, and they glory in their shame, with minds set on earthly things.
verses.kjv: 19 Whose end is destruction, whose God is their belly, and whose glory is in their shame, who mind earthly things.)
verses.niv: 19 Their destiny is destruction, their god is their stomach, and their glory is in their shame. Their mind is on earthly things.

verses.esv:
18   Pride goes before destruction,
    and a haughty spirit before a fall.
verses.kjv: 18 Pride goeth before destruction, and an haughty spirit before a fall.
verses.niv: 18 Pride goes before destruction, a haughty spirit before a fall.

verses.esv: 9 But those who desire to be rich fall into temptation, into a snare, into many senseless and harmful desires that plunge people into ruin and destruction.
verses.kjv: 9 But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and into many foolish and hurtful lusts, which drown men in destruction and perdition.
verses.niv: 9 People who want to get rich fall into temptation and a trap and into many foolish and harmful desires that plunge men into ruin and destruction.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv:
2   Clouds and thick darkness are all around him;
    righteousness and justice are the foundation of his throne.
3   Fire goes before him
    and burns up his adversaries all around.
4   His lightnings light up the world;
    the earth sees and trembles.
5   The mountains melt like wax before the LORD,
    before the Lord of all the earth.
6   The heavens proclaim his righteousness,
    and all the peoples see his glory.
7   All worshipers of images are put to shame,
    who make their boast in worthless idols;
    worship him, all you gods!
verses.kjv: 2 Clouds and darkness are round about him: righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne. 3 A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about. 4 His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled. 5 The hills melted like wax at the presence of the LORD, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth. 6 The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory. 7 Confounded be all they that serve graven images, that boast themselves of idols: worship him, all ye gods.
verses.niv: 2 Clouds and thick darkness surround him; righteousness and justice are the foundation of his throne. 3 Fire goes before him and consumes his foes on every side. 4 His lightning lights up the world; the earth sees and trembles. 5 The mountains melt like wax before the LORD, before the Lord of all the earth. 6 The heavens proclaim his righteousness, and all the peoples see his glory. 7 All who worship images are put to shame, those who boast in idols- worship him, all you gods!

verses.esv:
12   Before destruction a man’s heart is haughty,
    but humility comes before honor.
verses.kjv: 12 Before destruction the heart of man is haughty, and before honour is humility.
verses.niv: 12 Before his downfall a man's heart is proud, but humility comes before honor.

verses.esv:
10   The righteous will rejoice when he sees the vengeance;
    he will bathe his feet in the blood of the wicked.
verses.kjv: 10 The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked.
verses.niv: 10 The righteous will be glad when they are avenged, when they bathe their feet in the blood of the wicked.

verses.esv: 7 Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
verses.kjv: 7 Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
verses.niv: 7 Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

verses.esv:
47   panic and pitfall have come upon us,
    devastation and destruction;
verses.kjv: 47 Fear and a snare is come upon us, desolation and destruction.
verses.niv: 47 We have suffered terror and pitfalls, ruin and destruction."

verses.esv: 16     in their paths are ruin and misery,
verses.kjv: 16 Destruction and misery are in their ways:
verses.niv: 16 ruin and misery mark their ways,

verses.esv:
20   He sent out his word and healed them,
    and delivered them from their destruction.
verses.kjv: 20 He sent his word, and healed them, and delivered them from their destructions.
verses.niv: 20 He sent forth his word and healed them; he rescued them from the grave.

verses.esv: 22 What if God, desiring to show his wrath and to make known his power, has endured with much patience vessels of wrath prepared for destruction,
verses.kjv: 22 What if God, willing to shew his wrath, and to make his power known, endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction:
verses.niv: 22 What if God, choosing to show his wrath and make his power known, bore with great patience the objects of his wrath--prepared for destruction?

verses.esv: 1:1 The revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave him to show to his servants the things that must soon take place. He made it known by sending his angel to his servant John,
verses.kjv: 1 The Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave unto him, to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass; and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John:
verses.niv: 1 The revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave him to show his servants what must soon take place. He made it known by sending his angel to his servant John,

verses.esv: 9 They will suffer the punishment of eternal destruction, away from the presence of the Lord and from the glory of his might,
verses.kjv: 9 Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord, and from the glory of his power;
verses.niv: 9 They will be punished with everlasting destruction and shut out from the presence of the Lord and from the majesty of his power

verses.esv: 3 While people are saying, “There is peace and security,” then sudden destruction will come upon them as labor pains come upon a pregnant woman, and they will not escape.
verses.kjv: 3 For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.
verses.niv: 3 While people are saying, "Peace and safety," destruction will come on them suddenly, as labor pains on a pregnant woman, and they will not escape.

verses.esv: 28 And since they did not see fit to acknowledge God, God gave them up to a debased mind to do what ought not to be done.
verses.kjv: 28 And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge, God gave them over to a reprobate mind, to do those things which are not convenient;
verses.niv: 28 Furthermore, since they did not think it worthwhile to retain the knowledge of God, he gave them over to a depraved mind, to do what ought not to be done.

verses.esv: 13 “Enter by the narrow gate. For the gate is wide and the way is easy that leads to destruction, and those who enter by it are many.
verses.kjv: 13 Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat:
verses.niv: 13 "Enter through the narrow gate. For wide is the gate and broad is the road that leads to destruction, and many enter through it.

verses.esv:
10   Arise and go,
    for this is no place to rest,
  because of uncleanness that destroys
    with a grievous destruction.
verses.kjv: 10 Arise ye, and depart; for this is not your rest: because it is polluted, it shall destroy you, even with a sore destruction.
verses.niv: 10 Get up, go away! For this is not your resting place, because it is defiled, it is ruined, beyond all remedy.

verses.esv:
7   Their feet run to evil,
    and they are swift to shed innocent blood;
  their thoughts are thoughts of iniquity;
    desolation and destruction are in their highways.
verses.kjv: 7 Their feet run to evil, and they make haste to shed innocent blood: their thoughts are thoughts of iniquity; wasting and destruction are in their paths.
verses.niv: 7 Their feet rush into sin; they are swift to shed innocent blood. Their thoughts are evil thoughts; ruin and destruction mark their ways.

verses.esv:
8   Open your mouth for the mute,
    for the rights of all who are destitute.
verses.kjv: 8 Open thy mouth for the dumb in the cause of all such as are appointed to destruction.
verses.niv: 8 "Speak up for those who cannot speak for themselves, for the rights of all who are destitute.

verses.esv: 8 But as for the cowardly, the faithless, the detestable, as for murderers, the sexually immoral, sorcerers, idolaters, and all liars, their portion will be in the lake that burns with fire and sulfur, which is the second death.”
verses.kjv: 8 But the fearful, and unbelieving, and the abominable, and murderers, and whoremongers, and sorcerers, and idolaters, and all liars, shall have their part in the lake which burneth with fire and brimstone: which is the second death.
verses.niv: 8 But the cowardly, the unbelieving, the vile, the murderers, the sexually immoral, those who practice magic arts, the idolaters and all liars--their place will be in the fiery lake of burning sulfur. This is the second death."

verses.esv: 5 you are to deliver this man to Satan for the destruction of the flesh, so that his spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord.
verses.kjv: 5 To deliver such an one unto Satan for the destruction of the flesh, that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Jesus.
verses.niv: 5 hand this man over to Satan, so that the sinful nature may be destroyed and his spirit saved on the day of the Lord.

verses.esv: 10 The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy. I came that they may have life and have it abundantly.
verses.kjv: 10 The thief cometh not, but for to steal, and to kill, and to destroy: I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly.
verses.niv: 10 The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.
